author: Staff Reporter
text:
A couple was found dead with injuries on their body near the agricultural fields near here on Friday.

Vasu(45), a driver, belonging to Keelnachipattu village near here was working in Chennai. His wife Amutha(25) was staying in her maternal home in Sathakuppam village near Vanapuram.

The couple have a two year old girl child. Vasu visited Sathakuppam on Friday to attend a family function. Vasu and his wife went to the field in the morning.

By about noon, some wayfarers found both of them dead.

The deadbodies bore marks of grievous injuries. Vanapuram police rushed to the spot.

Further investigations are on.
title: Couple found dead
